programme.title: Tulevikutähtede muusikastuudio
programme.desc: John ja Luke lähevad oma endist klaveriõpetajat vaatama, kuid saavad seal ootamatu uudise. Leia ja Maggie satuvad koos kontserdile. Jude püüab Evat aidata.

programme.title: Noor meister
programme.desc: Sellel nädalal võtavad noore meistri tiitli nimel mõõtu sõiduautotehnikud. Eesti ühe populaarseima kutseala võistlusele niisama õlinäppudel ja hobimehaanikutel asja pole! Kuidas saavad noored autotehnikud ajapinge all hakkama veermikukontrolli ja järelkäru juhtmete ühendamisega? Võistlusele ajab hääle sisse Laura Prits. Tootja ULM OÜ.

programme.title: Elu allpool nulli
programme.desc: Kaviki laager on Arktika lennukite tankla ja turvapaik. Sulav tundra on Sue lennuraja aga üle ujutanud ja lennukid ei saa maanduda. Üleujutus ei ähvarda ainult Sue sissetulekut, vaid ka pilootide elu. Ricko saabub koos lastega Husliasse, ent karu on nende koju sisse murdnud ja kogu toidu nahka pannud. Ricko kindlustab maja ja õpetab lastele uusi oskusi. Kala on Hailstone’ide põhitoit ja püügiks tuleb valmistuda enne, kui kalaränne algab. Agnes vaatab võrgud üle ja teeb katkised korda, et õigel ajal kõik vajalik käepärast oleks.

programme.title: Häälega merele
programme.desc: Kas mööda merd on võimalik hääletada? Kaks noort naist proovivad järele. Reisisaate esimeses osas õpivad neiud purjetamist, et oleks lihtsam Euroopa sadamates jahtide peale saada. Sadamast sadamasse võõraid moosides loodavad nad jõuda kuu ajaga Eestist Portugali. Saate autorid on Mari Tamm ja Keiti Väliste.

programme.title: Olav Ehala 70. Juubelikontsert
programme.desc: Parimad hetked Alexela Kontserdimajas toimunud juubelikontserdilt, millega tähistati helilooja ja muusiku Olav Ehala 70. sünnipäeva. Teatavasti on juubilari näol tegu mehega, kelle looming on ühtaegu isikupärane ja avatud, peaaegu kättesaamatult ilus ja samas sügavalt omane. Lavastaja Veiko Tubin loob teatri, filmi ja muusika väljendusvahendeid ühendava kontsertetenduse, milles osalevad Collegium Musicale ja Ellerhein, lauljad Hanna-Liina Võsa, Nele-Liis Vaiksoo ja Lauri Liiv, Pärnu Linnaorkester dirigent Kaspar Männi juhtimisel ning Tallinna Linnateatri laulvad näitlejad. Loomulikult on laval ka sündmuse peategelane ise koos oma kvartetiga. Režissöör Keiti Väliste, juhtoperaator Andrus Rebane, produtsent Kadi Katarina Priske.

programme.title: Tulevikutähtede muusikastuudio
programme.desc: Clara tahab teistele muljet avaldada ja esitab võõrast lugu enda laulu pähe. Luke esitab Johnile ultimaatumi. Maggie ja Theo võistlevad raha eest laulmises.

programme.title: Fiksikud
programme.desc: Kes on fiksikud? See on suur saladus. Fiksikud hoolitsevad seadmete eest, puhastavad, määrivad ja kui vaja, ka remondivad. Fiksikud varjavad end inimeste eest, aga nad on kõikjal - arvutites, külmikutes, televiisorites.

programme.title: Minu rüütel ja mina
programme.desc: Ronni tahab tõestada, et ta on tõsiseltvõetav ajakirjanik ja otsustab intervjueerida kivikoletist. Kahjuks solvab ta koletist, kes otsustab kättemaksuks ära süüa lossi.

programme.title: Nöps ja Mikk
programme.desc: Käsitöölinnas korraldatakse printsess Helgi auks paraad, kuid pidurdamatu tõlla tõttu tõotavad pidustused untsu minna. Nöps peab kihutava tõlla ruttu peatama.

programme.title: Ella, Oscar ja Huu
programme.desc: Oskar leiab eksinud pardipoja ja otsustab koos Ellaga linnu eest hoolitseda. Pole sugugi lihtne olla lapsevanem!

programme.title: Susapusa Okidos
programme.desc: Kui Susapusa hommikusöögiks mõeldud roheline sokk äkki kaob, läheb ta oma sõpradelt abi paluma ja leiab nad paberist koletist valmistamas. Aga paar tükki paberit on puudu, sest keegi on Okido paberipuu tühjaks korjanud. Kes on see pahategija ja miks me vahel ei märka asju, mis on meil otse nina all?

programme.title: NOVA
programme.desc: Täiskasvanud söövad mõnikord asju, mis lastele ei maitse. Panime Gustavi, Aksli ja Martini proovile, mida nemad gurmeetoitudest arvavad. Kas oled kunagi mõelnud, kuidas on võimalik, et pangakaart on nagu võlukepp: lähed ja viipad sellega poes ja saad päris asju vastu. Kuidas kaardimaksed õigupoolest töötavad? Aksel käis Eesti Panga muuseumis asja uurimas. Ida-Liisa soovitab teile raamatut nimega "Elevant". Kõigele põnevale, mis toimub koolis, trennis ja mida muidu vabal ajal ette võtta, annab vastused laste oma saade NOVA! Meie saatejuhtidele ja reporteritele saad oma ideid, soove ja küllakutseid saata e-posti nova@err.ee. Sarja toimetavad Laura Kõrvits ja Lota Viik, režissöörid Kristo Veinberg ja Maarja Pärsim.

programme.title: Zombi Lars
programme.desc: Koolidirektor võtab Tessi kaasa ja läheb temaga linnavalitsusse. Tessil õnnestub anda asjadele uus pööre, aga Torill pole temaga üldse rahul.

programme.title: Mesilane Maia
programme.desc: Aaasamutukad õpivad, et üks pealtnäha tühine sündmus võib kaasa tuua ootamatult tõsiseid tagajärgi.

programme.title: Priit ja Prääks
programme.desc: Priit ja Kiira osalevad teaduskonkursil ning Prääks teeb kogemata Kiira paljundusmasina abil endast terve hulga kloone. Vallandub tõeline kaos ja Priit peab kõik pardid kokku korjama, enne kui suurem pahandus juhtub.

programme.title: Mesitaru
programme.desc: Terve pere nuputab üheskoos, miks Pisimumm korraga enam süüa ei taha.

programme.title: Pipi Pikksukk
Pipi läheb lõbustusparki
programme.desc: Linna tuleb lõbustuspark ja Pipi läheb sõpradega seda avastama. Lõbustuspargis on väga tore ja lapsed saavad palju lõbutseda.

programme.title: Lotte lood
programme.desc: Leiutajateküla Lotte otsustab koos sõprade Bruno ja Albertiga teha oma emadele ühe väga toreda üllatuse. Aga nagu peagi selgub, ei jää see sugugi esimeseks üllatuseks... Autorid Andrus Kivirähk, Janno Põldma ja Heiki Ernits, lavastas Ain Mäeots, režissöör Elo Selirand. Osades Lotte - Helena Pruuli, Bruno - Priit Strandberg, Albert - Vallo Kirs jpt.

programme.title: Mina ja Miia
programme.desc: Eksikombel tõmbavad Vincent ja Paula Miia pärismaailma, aga ta peab ruttu tagasi kiirustama, et otsida üles viimane trompusetükike ning pidada maha lahing Tsentoopia päästmiseks.

programme.title: Zombi Lars
programme.desc: Koolidirektor võtab Tessi kaasa ja läheb temaga linnavalitsusse. Tessil õnnestub anda asjadele uus pööre, aga Torill pole temaga üldse rahul.

programme.title: Aegluubis maailm
programme.desc: Olles maganud veidras tunnelis ja läbinud Fukushima piirkonna, sõidavad reisisellid Hokkaidosse, kus nad naudivad traditsioonilist Jaapani kööki: sashimi’t, tempura’t ning elusaid kalmaare. Vähemalt saavad nad järgmisel korral einestada vaikses ja rahulikus kohakeses. Või kas ikka saavad?

programme.title: Meie
programme.desc: Liigutav ja lustakas Briti sari Petersenide pere suurest Euroopa-reisist, mis hoolimata pereisa hoolikalt ning põhjalikult tehtud plaanidest kipub viltu vedama veel enne, kui on reisile asutud. Sari põhineb David Nichollsi samanimelisel romaanil. Douglas ootab pikisilmi plaanitud perereisi, kuid enne ärasõitu teatab tema naine Connie, et tahab pärast 20-aastast abielu lahku minna. Ka perepoeg Albie on pesast välja lendamas. Ehkki perekond seisab lagunemise künnisel, otsustatakse ühine reis siiski ette võtta, kuna piletid on ostetud ja plaanid tehtud.

programme.title: Elu allpool nulli
programme.desc: Jessie Holmes peab vahelduvatest aastaaegadest sammu võrra ees püsima. Ta kavatseb varuda terve aasta jagu puid ja ehitab parve, et palgid koju tuua. Kõik sõltub sellest, kas parv peab koormale vastu. Ricko DeWilde on mitu päeva lastega Huslia looduses veetnud ja neile atapaski tavasid õpetanud. Nüüd tuleb tal aga ka endale vajalikke varusid koguda. Hailstone’id ostavad uue paadi, ent katkine mootor takistab kojutulekut. Torm on tõusmas ja teele tuleb asuda veel enne pimedat.

programme.title: Ema
programme.desc: On lihavõtteaeg ning Cathy ja Micael plaanivad koos elutuba koristada. Kellyl ja Jasonil on muud mõttes.

programme.title: Rituaalid vees
Dive - Rituals in Water
programme.desc: Vanas basseinis ookeani ja mägede lähedal tegeleb Snorri Magnusson kuus päeva nädalas hommikust õhtuni imikutega. Ta on töötanud siin 28 aastat ja loonud oma rituaalid. Basseinist on saanud omaette maailm, kus imikud sukelduvad, seisavad tema peopesal, mängivad ja on õnnelikud. See on püha paik, kus värsked lapsevanemad veedavad aega koos lastega ja loovad nendega tugeva sideme.

programme.title: Metsik linn
programme.desc: Agent Duque saadab Jhoni panka dokumente pildistama. Mariol on sekeldused politseiga.

programme.title: Metsik linn
programme.desc: Politsei võtab ette nii ehitusfirma kui kui Total Security. Jhon saab teavet inimröövi kohta ja Mario on reetmise tõttu šokis.

programme.title: Kui me hobusevargil käisime
Ut og stjæle hester
programme.desc: Tänapäeva tuntuima Norra kirjaniku Per Pettersoni samanimelise bestselleri alusel valminud draama. 1999. aasta talv. Vananev leskmees Trond (Stellan Skarsgård) on seadnud end üksikuna sisse vanas majas, ilmakärast eemal. Ootamatult avastab Trond, et naabriks on tal mees, keda ta tundis juba aastal 1948. Valusad mälestused tõusevad taas esile – sõprus, esimene armastus, perekondade lagunemine... Norra aasta filmi nominent kümnes kategoorias. Berliini filmifestivalil Kuldkaru nominent. R: Hans Petter Moland.

programme.title: Minu rüütel ja mina
programme.desc: Ronni tahab tõestada, et ta on tõsiseltvõetav ajakirjanik ja otsustab intervjueerida kivikoletist. Kahjuks solvab ta koletist, kes otsustab kättemaksuks ära süüa lossi.

programme.desc: Aaasamutukad õpivad, et üks pealtnäha tühine sündmus võib kaasa tuua ootamatult tõsiseid tagajärgi.

programme.title: Mesitaru
programme.desc: Terve pere nuputab üheskoos, miks Pisimumm korraga enam süüa ei taha.

programme.title: Tulevikutähtede muusikastuudio
programme.desc: Clara tahab teistele muljet avaldada ja esitab võõrast lugu enda laulu pähe. Luke esitab Johnile ultimaatumi. Maggie ja Theo võistlevad raha eest laulmises.

programme.title: Noor meister
programme.desc: Sel nädalal astuvad noore meistri tiitli nimel võistlustulle elektrikud. Pinget on sõna otseses mõttes palju ning saates selgub, kes oskab elektrikilbiga ümber käia ja kes jookseb võistluse ajal lühisesse. Saadet juhib särtsakas Laura Prits. Tootja ULM OÜ.

programme.title: Elu allpool nulli
programme.desc: Jessie Holmes peab vahelduvatest aastaaegadest sammu võrra ees püsima. Ta kavatseb varuda terve aasta jagu puid ja ehitab parve, et palgid koju tuua. Kõik sõltub sellest, kas parv peab koormale vastu. Ricko DeWilde on mitu päeva lastega Huslia looduses veetnud ja neile atapaski tavasid õpetanud. Nüüd tuleb tal aga ka endale vajalikke varusid koguda. Hailstone’id ostavad uue paadi, ent katkine mootor takistab kojutulekut. Torm on tõusmas ja teele tuleb asuda veel enne pimedat.

programme.title: Metslased
programme.desc: Metslased on Järvamaal, Hundipalu Tiidu kunagises tagakohas, Kollassaare rabatalus, mille Erki koos sõpradega on toonud tagasi elule. Maitseme metsarestorani ande. Kuidas mekib konn? Testime suitsusauna ja lapime karurasvasalviga jalgu. Otsime keset raba üles metsavendade punkri jäänused. Hundijutud hundimees Valeriga. Meiega liitub uus metslane Ranno. Lisaks uusi tarkusi loodusest ja kasulikke matkanippe. Sarja autor Lemo.

programme.title: Kultuuristuudio. Looming
programme.desc: Sarja "Kultuuristuudio. Looming" iga osa vaatleb ühe looja ühte või kahte märgilist teost, mida avatakse koos tegija enda ning tema loomingu mõtestajaga. Saate finaalis üllatab külaline vaatajaid ühe teda ennast mõjutanud olulise teose looga. Saatejuhid Ave Häkli, Kaspar Viilup, Meelis Oidsalu. Režissöör Ülle Õun.

programme.title: Tulevikutähtede muusikastuudio
programme.desc: Maggie onu pakub tüdrukutele võimalust ühte nende lemmikbändi soojendada, aga asja juures on üks konks. Isaac avastab, et tema produtsendist vend käib Maryga ja veedab üha rohkem aega stuudios.

programme.title: Fiksikud
programme.desc: Kes on fiksikud? See on suur saladus. Fiksikud hoolitsevad seadmete eest, puhastavad, määrivad ja kui vaja, ka remondivad. Fiksikud varjavad end inimeste eest, aga nad on kõikjal - arvutites, külmikutes, televiisorites.

programme.title: Minu rüütel ja mina
programme.desc: Juku tahab Laurile koha kätte näidata ja lendab Björni seljas lossi, et teiste kannupoiste ees oma lemmikloomaga uhkustada. Selline käitumine haavab Björni tundeid ja paneb Lauri veel kiuslikumalt käituma.

programme.title: Nöps ja Mikk
programme.desc: Nöps ja Mikk aitavad printsess Helgil otsida salapärast olendit, kellega tantsimine on viimane ülesanne, mille Helgi peab täitma, et printsessiks jääda.

programme.title: Ella, Oscar ja Huu
programme.desc: Oskari vanemad on ära ja ta peab kaks ööd magama Ella juures. Huu naudib olukorda, kuid Oskar tunneb end veidi õnnetuna.

programme.title: Susapusa Okidos
programme.desc: Sõbrad lähevad randa ja ehitavad uhke liivalossi. Tööst väsinud, tahaksid nad end jäätisega värskendada, aga Lolly rannakioski võtmed on kadunud. Kuidas leida tükikest metalli rannaliivast? Appi võetakse magnet. Lapsed saavad teada, kuidas magnet töötab. Aga kas see aitab ka kadunud võtmed üles leida?

programme.title: NOVA
programme.desc: Saalihoki on populaarne spordiala, saatsime Fredi Spartasse saalihoki trenni järele proovima, kuidas tal see välja tuleb. Kas sina oskad saagi kasutada? Edith käis Rocca al Mare koolis seda õppimas. Aksel ja Otto õpetavad üht rooga, mis valmib lihtsalt, on väga maitsev ja mida on ka lõbus teha.

programme.title: Zombi Lars
programme.desc: Peale Tessi tempu linnavalitsuses ei pea Lars enam kolima. Ka Tessi pere on pigem rahul tema käitumisega. Lars tahab Annalt vabandust paluda.

programme.title: Mesilane Maia
programme.desc: Villi kardab, et teda on tabanud ebaõnne needus. Kas Maia oskab teda aidata?

programme.title: Priit ja Prääks
programme.desc: Hipp ja Hopp lähevad otsima Kuldset Tõru, kuid selgub, et see on terves metsas viimane. Kuidas oleks võimalik mets päästa ja teha nii, et Kuldsed Tõrud ei lõpeks?

programme.title: Mesitaru
programme.desc: Mesitarus peetakse pidu – tulemas on kuninganna suur kroonijuubel.

programme.title: Hei, Kutsa
programme.desc: Oravad aitavad Kutsal kadunud lambaid otsida.

programme.title: Mowgli. Akela viimane jaht
Maugli. Poslednjaja ohota Akelõ
programme.desc: Rudyard Kiplingi jutustuste "Mowgli" ehk "Džungliraamat" järgi on seiklusloo viieosalisena ekraniseerinud Sojuzmultfilm aastatel 1967-1971. Dubleeris Tallinnfilm, tõlkija Tatjana Hallap, režissöör Eugen Rozental, näitlejad Hans Kaldoja, Karl Kalkun, Ellu Puudist, Linda Tubin, Helmut Vaag, Asta Lott ja Endel Simmermann.

programme.title: Lassie
programme.desc: Üks kohalik rantšopidaja tuleb poodi, et osta püüniseid huntidele, keda süüdistab oma karja kallal käimises. Proua Lee ja lapsed ei taha asja uskuda ning võtavad ette tee huntide pesitsuspaika, et kontrollida, kas asjal on tõepõhi all. Õige pea avastavad nad, et süüdlane on hoopis keegi teine.

programme.title: Mina ja Miia
programme.desc: Miia sõidab suveks vanaisa Renzo juurde tallu, kus kohtub paljude loomade ja ka nägusa abilise Marioga. Tsentoopias valitseb pealtnäha rahu, siis aga ilmub silmapiirile kummaline lendav saar ehk Rikseli rändtsirkus.

programme.title: Zombi Lars
programme.desc: Peale Tessi tempu linnavalitsuses ei pea Lars enam kolima. Ka Tessi pere on pigem rahul tema käitumisega. Lars tahab Annalt vabandust paluda.

programme.title: Aegluubis maailm
programme.desc: Daisetsuzani rahvuspargis kõndimine võib tunduda tõelise seiklusena, kuni sa satud Jaapani turistide grupi sekka. Seiklusjanu kustutatakse pruunkarude koduks olevas metsas ringi sõites ja taamal terendab ka Maailma Lõpp.

programme.title: Vaiksel ookeanil kapten Cooki jälgedes
programme.desc: Sarja viimases osas läheb Sam Neill kapten Cooki jälgedes Arktikasse ja Hawaiile, kus Cook oma lõpu leidis.

programme.title: Minu Eestimaa
programme.desc: Semiootik ja kirjanik Valdur Mikita raamat “Lingvistiline mets” pälvis suurt tunnustust ning läks paljudele hinge. Metsad ja loodus laiemalt on Valduri elus väga tähtsal kohal, sest seal viibimine toob värskeid ideid, pakub võimaluse kohtuda loomadega ning õpetab seoseid. Kirjanik tutvustab vaatajatele üht unikaalset paika, mida saab kutsuda Eesti looduse kolmekordseks.

programme.title: Elu allpool nulli
programme.desc: Andy saabub pärast kuut lõunapoolsetes osariikides veedetud kuud koos sõbratar Denise’iga Eagle’isse. Koerte eest hoolitses tema sõber, ent majas ei elanud kedagi. Andy peab veenduma, et kõik oleks ohutu ning ära tuleb teha vajalikud parandustööd. Sue Aikens pakub suvekuudel klientidele kütust, toitu ja mugavusi. Ent halb ilm on tema ettevõtmisele mõneks ajaks pidurit tõmmanud. Ta palub tuttavat pilooti end laagrist eemal asuvasse kalastuspaika viia, ent retk tuleb lühike ja saak pole kindel. Kiwalikis kogutakse praegu samuti talvevarusid. Chipil tuleb minna hanejahile ning Agnes ja Tinmiaq korjavad mustikaid.

programme.title: Minu pere
One of the Boys
programme.desc: Rogeri ema tuleb Londonisse kohtuma oma tulevase minia Abiga. Beni vana joomakaaslane on muutunud.

programme.title: Ibiza
programme.desc: Philippe on vanemapoolne arstihärra Pariisis, saatuse tahtel satub ta koos oma uue kallima ja viimase kahe teismelise lapsega Ibizale puhkama. Lastel salajased põhjused just sinna suvitama minna ja saare omapärane seltsielu viivad kogu laiendatud perekonna ootamatutesse kohtadesse ja seiklustesse.

programme.title: Äraostmatud
programme.desc: Mida enam üksikasju politseijuhtide korruptsioonist päevavalgele tuleb, seda rohkem kaldub Stephen Lindsay teooriat uskuma. Lõpuks on Hastings sunnitud vahistama ka oma otsese ülemuse.(n)

programme.title: Britannia värvipildis
programme.desc: "Britannia värvipildis" astub väga eduka sarja "Ameerika värvipildis" jälgedes, mis oli üks ambitsioonikamaid koloreerimisprojekte läbi aegade. Uues sarjas saab värvid tagasi Suurbritannia 20. sajandi ajalugu. Esimeses osas: Kuninglik perekond on praegu üks Suurbritannia armastatumaid institutsioone, kuid 20. sajandi algul tuli neil võidelda populaarsuse ja ellujäämise eest. Haruldased filmikaadrid, mida saab esimest korda näha värvilisena, jutustavad loo sellest, kuidas Windsori kuningakoda oli põrmu varisemas ja kuidas nad tõid monarhia katastroofi äärelt tagasi.(n)

programme.title: Minu rüütel ja mina
programme.desc: Juku tahab Laurile koha kätte näidata ja lendab Björni seljas lossi, et teiste kannupoiste ees oma lemmikloomaga uhkustada. Selline käitumine haavab Björni tundeid ja paneb Lauri veel kiuslikumalt käituma.(n)

programme.title: Mesilane Maia
programme.desc: Villi kardab, et teda on tabanud ebaõnne needus. Kas Maia oskab teda aidata?(n)

programme.title: Mesitaru
programme.desc: Mesitarus peetakse pidu – tulemas on kuninganna suur kroonijuubel.(n)

programme.title: Ella, Oscar ja Huu
programme.desc: Oskari vanemad on ära ja ta peab kaks ööd magama Ella juures. Huu naudib olukorda, kuid Oskar tunneb end veidi õnnetuna.(n)

programme.title: Nöps ja Mikk
programme.desc: Nöps ja Mikk aitavad printsess Helgil otsida salapärast olendit, kellega tantsimine on viimane ülesanne, mille Helgi peab täitma, et printsessiks jääda.(n)

programme.title: Priit ja Prääks
programme.desc: Hipp ja Hopp lähevad otsima Kuldset Tõru, kuid selgub, et see on terves metsas viimane. Kuidas oleks võimalik mets päästa ja teha nii, et Kuldsed Tõrud ei lõpeks?(n)

programme.title: Mowgli. Akela viimane jaht
Maugli. Poslednjaja ohota Akelõ
programme.desc: Rudyard Kiplingi jutustuste "Mowgli" ehk "Džungliraamat" järgi on seiklusloo viieosalisena ekraniseerinud Sojuzmultfilm aastatel 1967-1971. Dubleeris Tallinnfilm, tõlkija Tatjana Hallap, režissöör Eugen Rozental, näitlejad Hans Kaldoja, Karl Kalkun, Ellu Puudist, Linda Tubin, Helmut Vaag, Asta Lott ja Endel Simmermann.(n)

programme.title: Zombi Lars
programme.desc: Peale Tessi tempu linnavalitsuses ei pea Lars enam kolima. Ka Tessi pere on pigem rahul tema käitumisega. Lars tahab Annalt vabandust paluda.(n)

programme.title: Hei, Kutsa
programme.desc: Oravad aitavad Kutsal kadunud lambaid otsida.(n)

programme.title: Mina ja Miia
programme.desc: Miia sõidab suveks vanaisa Renzo juurde tallu, kus kohtub paljude loomade ja ka nägusa abilise Marioga. Tsentoopias valitseb pealtnäha rahu, siis aga ilmub silmapiirile kummaline lendav saar ehk Rikseli rändtsirkus.(n)

programme.title: NOVA
programme.desc: Saalihoki on populaarne spordiala, saatsime Fredi Spartasse saalihoki trenni järele proovima, kuidas tal see välja tuleb. Kas sina oskad saagi kasutada? Edith käis Rocca al Mare koolis seda õppimas. Aksel ja Otto õpetavad üht rooga, mis valmib lihtsalt, on väga maitsev ja mida on ka lõbus teha.(n)

programme.title: Tulevikutähtede muusikastuudio
programme.desc: Maggie onu pakub tüdrukutele võimalust ühte nende lemmikbändi soojendada, aga asja juures on üks konks. Isaac avastab, et tema produtsendist vend käib Maryga ja veedab üha rohkem aega stuudios.(n)

programme.title: Noor meister
programme.desc: Sellel nädalal võtavad noore meistri tiitli nimel mõõtu hotelli vastuvõtu administraatorid. Kuidas saavad noored hakkama võõra linna tutvustamise ja pahaste puhkajatega? Näeme hotellitöö saladusi ja kavalat kauplemist külalistega. Vaatajatele avab ukse teenindusmaailma Laura Prits. Tootja ULM OÜ.(n)

programme.title: Elu allpool nulli
programme.desc: Andy saabub pärast kuut lõunapoolsetes osariikides veedetud kuud koos sõbratar Denise’iga Eagle’isse. Koerte eest hoolitses tema sõber, ent majas ei elanud kedagi. Andy peab veenduma, et kõik oleks ohutu ning ära tuleb teha vajalikud parandustööd. Sue Aikens pakub suvekuudel klientidele kütust, toitu ja mugavusi. Ent halb ilm on tema ettevõtmisele mõneks ajaks pidurit tõmmanud. Ta palub tuttavat pilooti end laagrist eemal asuvasse kalastuspaika viia, ent retk tuleb lühike ja saak pole kindel. Kiwalikis kogutakse praegu samuti talvevarusid. Chipil tuleb minna hanejahile ning Agnes ja Tinmiaq korjavad mustikaid.(n)

programme.title: Salme viikingid
programme.desc: Dokumentaalsarja viimases osas räägime võimalikest teooriatest, mis Saaremaal, Salme külas 1300 aastat tagasi juhtuda võis ning mille tagajärjel need 41 viikingit koos laevade ja uhkete panustega maapõue sängitati. Asjale lisab vürtsi viikingiaja spetsialist Marika Mägi, kellel on juhtunust oma nägemus, mis teiste teooriatega täiesti vastuollu läheb. Režissöör Liis Lindmaa, toimetaja Sigrid Salutee, produtsent Anatoli Tafitšuk, tootja ULM Production.(n)

programme.title: Kultuuristuudio. Arutelu
programme.desc: Olukord maailmas on uuesti päevakorda tõstnud ajaloonarratiivide tähtsuse. Kas see, kuidas kirjutatakse ajalugu, määrab rahvaste saatusi? Kas ajaloos on võimalik esitada lõplikku tõde või vastipidi: kehtestada valed? Mis mõjutab inimesi rohkem - akadeemilised ajalooteosed, ajaloolised romaanid ja filmid või hoopis altenatiivajaood ja Vikipeedia? Saates otsivad Maarja Vainoga küsimustele vastuseid ajaloolane Lauri Vahtre ning kirjanik Indrek Hargla.(n)

programme.title: Orienteerumisjooksu EM Rakveres
programme.desc: Rakvere lähistel toimuvate Euroopa meistrivõistluste esimesed medalid jagatakse välja tavarajavõistluses.(n)

programme.title: Zombi Lars
programme.desc: Annal pole pääsu ja ta peab võimlemispeol esinema. Lars nuputab välja kavala plaani, kuidas see ära hoida.(n)

programme.title: Kollikool
programme.desc: Täiskuu abiga õpivad väikesed koletised kasvatama võlulilli ja teevad preili Turtsule super kollitusliku sünnipäevaüllatuse!(n)

programme.title: Kroonitud peakesed
programme.desc: Varja läheb teiste tsaaritaridega tülli ja jookseb kolikambrisse mossitama. Seal kohtab ta huvitavaid asukaid.(n)

programme.title: Siilipoiss Alfredi salapärased seiklused
programme.desc: Metsa eksinud lapsed satuvad vana maja juurde, mida ümbritseb veider rohekas helendus. Ümbruskond on ärevil ja kõik kahtlustavad kummitusi, kuni Alfred juhtumisse selgust toob.(n)

programme.title: Mesitaru
programme.desc: Mesilased teevad täna teaduskatseid ja nalja saab kõvasti.(n)

programme.title: Hei, Kutsa
programme.desc: Kutsa õpetab Oravaid koristama, kuid see polegi nii lihtne töö...(n)

programme.title: Lastetuba
programme.desc: Markus leiab lastetoa ukse tagant aardekaardi! See leid toob ka esialgsetesse sõbrapäeva plaanidesse muutuse. Stsenarist Gert Kiiler, mängivad Oskar Seeman ja Mart Kampus.(n)

programme.title: Saara ja part
programme.desc: Saara ja Part püüavad ühe morni eesli tuju paremaks muuta.(n)

programme.title: Ott kosmoses
programme.desc: Ott satub startivasse kosmoselaeva ja lendab maailmaruumi. Nii algavad põnevad seiklused, mille jooksul Ott kogeb ammutuntud tõde: ilma koolitarkuseta elus läbi ei saa. Stsenarist Valdo Pant, režissöör Elbert Tuganov, operaator Heino Pars, kunstnik Halja Klaar, helilooja Heino Jürisalu. Film restaureeriti "Eesti Film 100" puhul 2009. aastal.(n)

programme.title: Mina ja Miia
programme.desc: Miiat ootab ees ootamatu kohtumine vana vaenlasega. Tsentoopias püüavad Miia, Juko ja Mo aru saada, mis mängu Riksel mängib.(n)

programme.title: Zombi Lars
programme.desc: Annal pole pääsu ja ta peab võimlemispeol esinema. Lars nuputab välja kavala plaani, kuidas see ära hoida.(n)

programme.title: Jalgpalli Euroopa konverentsiliiga
programme.desc: Paide linnameeskonna imeline euroteekond jätkub Konverentsi liiga kolmandas eelringis, kus vastaseks tuleb juba päris suurklubi, 34-kordne Belgia meister ja eurosarjadeski tituleeritud klubi Brüsseli Anderlecht. Kommentaar Tarmo Tiisler, stuudio Aet Süvari.(n)

programme.title: Elu allpool nulli
programme.desc: Kaviki laagri ainsa elanikuna peab Sue tundras ringi luusivaid kiskjaid kogu aeg silmas pidama. Kaalul on klientide ja tema enda turvalisus ning Kavikit tuleb iga hinna eest kaitsta. Ent täiendamist vajavad hädasti ka Sue kahanevad lihavarud. Vigastus sundis Andyt kuus kuud Eagle’ist eemal viibima, aga nüüd on ta tagasi, et killud uuesti kokku korjata. Ent ka Denise’i abiga on oma kätega ehitatud kodu taastamine suur väljakutse. Hülged on Hailstone’ide jaoks väga väärtuslikud. Neist saadakse talveks liha, rasva ja nahku. Ting ja Agnes kasutavad võimalust ning lähevad hülgejahile.(n)

programme.title: Aegluubis maailm
programme.desc: Sõbrad sõidavad paadiga oma reisi sihtkohta, lõõgastuvad looduslikus kuumaveeallikas ja külastavad sintoistide pühapaika. Seejärel pannakse karaokebaaris proovile häälepaelad.(n)

programme.title: Metsik linn
programme.desc: Mariot provotseeritakse koolis ja ta muutub vägivaldseks. Jhon võtab olulise pakkumise vastu ja läheb üksi Aníbali jahtima.(n)

programme.title: Metsik linn
programme.desc: Pärast keerulisi sündmusi pakutakse Leónile väljapääsu. Agent Duque leiab infot, mis viitavad kadunud lapse asukohale.(n)

programme.title: Pain & Gain
programme.desc: A trio of bodybuilders in Florida gets caught up in an extortion ring and a kidnapping scheme that goes terribly wrong.

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction
programme.desc: Sixty-five million years ago, an alien race, the "Creators", implanted an alloy, "Transformium", into the Earth. It is now excavated, along with the melted bodies of illegally hunted Autobots and Decepticons, by KSI industries to build transformer drones, like Galvatron. Optimus Prime, long in hiding from this hunt, emerges to defend his friends and face Galvatron who turns out to be an old enemy.

programme.title: The Recruit
programme.desc: Promising young man James Clayton graduated top of his class. He works in a bar and meets Walter Burke who wants to recruit him for the CIA. Clayton agrees to join the training center. He admires Layla, his skillful colleague and is tasked with finding a spy within the training program.

programme.title: Tarzan
programme.desc: The story of Tarzan, a young man who grew up in a family of gorillas, after his parents were killed by a leopard named Sabor. The gorillas raise him to grow up in their midst, and he becomes their hero after killing Sabor.

programme.title: Project Almanac
programme.desc: A group of high school teenagers find a way to build a time machine, and go back in time to fix their past mistakes in life, but soon they discover that messing with their past has catastrophic consequences on the future.

Dr. Adrian Helmsley is an American geologist who, while on a trip to India, learns that there has been increased solar activity. Dr. Helmsley also discovers that this will lead to a rise in the temperature of Earth’s core – a phenomenon which will have dire consequences for humanity. 2012 is said to be the end date of the Mayan calendar, which many believe marks the end of the world.

programme.title: Bumblebee
programme.desc: On the run in the year of 1987, Bumblebee finds refuge in a junkyard in a small Californian beach town and is found by Charlie, an 18 year old girl who is trying to find her place in the world. When Charlie revives him, she discovers that this is no ordinary, yellow VW bug.

programme.title: Dredd
programme.desc: In a desolate, dystopian American metropolis, cops have the combined powers of judge, jury and executioner in a chaotic landscape of drugs and rampant crime. Top Judge Dredd and his young trainee take on the merciless drug Lord Ma-Ma, whose home base is a 200-story complex rarely frequented by judges.

programme.title: Poltergeist
programme.desc: The film follows a family whose suburban home is invaded by angry spirits. When the terrifying apparitions escalate their attacks and take the youngest daughter, the family must come together to rescue her.

programme.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
programme.desc: Optimus Prime finds his home planet, Cybertron, now a dead planet, and tries to find the person behind its death. He finds a way to bring the planet back to life, but in order to do so, he needs to find an artifact, which is on Earth.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 1
programme.desc: Bella marries vampire Edward, and quickly finds out that she's pregnant. The Wolf Pack find out, and insist on killing her and her child, but Jacob decides to protect Bella. When Bella gives birth to her daughter, Edward turns her into a vampire, and when the Volturi finds out about the child, they decide to take her at any cost.

programme.desc: Bella and Edward's happiness with their daughter Renesmee is interrupted when a misunderstanding leaves the Volturi out for both their and their daughter's blood. The Cullens must make various alliances in order to protect their family from the upcoming threat.

programme.title: Beautiful Creatures
programme.desc: The lives of two girls intersect as they suffer their boyfriends' violence and mistakenly kill one of them, only for a corrupt inspector to be sent on their tail.

programme.title: Warm Bodies
programme.desc: After R (a highly unusual zombie) saves Julie from a zombie attack, the two form an unusual bond that sets in motion a sequence of events that could transform the entire lifeless world.

programme.desc: Putting a twist on the old fairytale, "Hansel & Gretel" brings us the siblings as grown up bounty hunters who track and kill witches all over the world. As the Blood Moon approaches, the pair encounter a new evil that might hold a secret to their past.

programme.title: Home of the Brave
programme.desc: Four vets struggle to adjust to civilian life after they return from a tour in Iraq. Haunted by what they have seen and what they have done, their psychological scars might be even harder to heal than their physical ones.(n)

programme.title: Stolen
programme.desc: A high-profile thief recently released from prison tries to reconnect with his daughter when she is kidnapped and held for ransom by a former accomplice. He has 12 hours to come up with $10 million dollars to save his teenage daughter.(n)

programme.title: Machine Gun Preacher
programme.desc: An ex-drug trader starts becomes a crusader and helps Sudanese orphans who have been forced to join the army.(n)

programme.title: Righteous Kill
programme.desc: With a serial killer who serves as a vigilante on the loose, two veteran cops team up with a younger duo in order to locate the murderer who has taken justice into his own hands. But the generation gap between the two investigating duos soon rears its head as the hunt for the killer heats up.(n)

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: Spencer is an undercover assassin who falls in love with Jen and he decides to retire and marry her. After several years, he finds huge reward to kill him, which makes him doubt everyone around him ,so he hides at Jen's father, who was also an assassin and he tries to help him.

programme.title: The Imitation Game
programme.desc: The true story of legendary cryptanalyst Alan Turing who along with his brilliant team of code-breakers at Britain's top-secret Government Code and Cypher School attempt to crack the German Enigma code during World War II.

programme.title: Me Before You
programme.desc: The story centers around a young woman working in a convenience store lived her life that she knows by counting the number of the steps to the bus stop down to the difficulty of accepting the love of her friend (Patrick). Unexpectedly she gets fired from work, while on the other side, a motorcycle accident occurred to the young (Will Traynor) prevent him from doing whatever he used in the past, consequently, their paths crosses, which results in making their lives happier and delighted.

programme.title: Vice
programme.desc: A look into the life of Dick Cheney, vice president to George W. Bush and one of the most influential figures in American and global politics. Focusing on his rise to become the most powerful men in the world, the film offers a glimpse into the behind the scenes politics of the Bush administration.

programme.title: Labor Pains
programme.desc: In an attempt to keep her job, Thea lies about being pregnant, but things get out of hand as she starts receiving special treatment and decides to keep up the act.

programme.title: Laggies
programme.desc: Feeling overwhelmed by the pressures of being an adult, Megan decides to take a break and hides at the house of a new teenager friend and her single father.

programme.title: Playing for Keeps
programme.desc: George Dryer, a charming former Scottish football star, is down on his luck and unable to find a sports-related job to pay his bills. He has a minimal connection with his son, Lewis, but as his ex-wife, Stacie, decides to remarry, he gets despondent and decides to pull his life together for his son and to win her back. To do this, he must rise above temptations, bribery and wrong career choices.

programme.title: Aloha
programme.desc: In Hawaii, a military contractor relives his glory days at the site of his greatest achievement. But his return to the island stirs up past memories with his former girlfriend, which makes his new feeling for his Air Force liaison more complicated.

programme.title: Two Night Stand
programme.desc: After two people make an online connection that leads to a one-night stand, they wake up to find themselves snowed in after sleeping through a blizzard that put all of Manhattan on ice. They have to extend their first night and turn it into a two-night stand.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Late in her reign, Queen Elizabeth I faces various challenges in the form of an impending Spanish invasion over religious differences, a conspiracy to seize the throne, familial betrayal, and a forbidden love affair with Sir Walter Raleigh.

programme.title: The King's Speech
programme.desc: King George VI is crowned king of England after his brother abdicates the throne ,but he struggles with his debilitating speech impediments and he's surrounded by those who doubt his ability to lead the country. The king starts up with a private speech therapist with unconventional strategies along with the help of his wife Elizabeth.

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
programme.desc: The true story of how pioneer mathematician Srinivasa Ramanujan overcame poverty and got into Cambridge under the guidance of professor G.H. Hardy.

programme.title: A United Kingdom
programme.desc: Based on true events, the film revolves around Prince Seretse Khama of Botswana (David Oyelowo), who caused a strong international uproar; when he married a white woman from London, Ruth Williams (Rosamund Pike), in the late 1940s.

programme.title: The Iron Lady
programme.desc: Tells the story of Margaret Thatcher, a woman who smashed barriers of gender and class to be heard in a male-dominated world. The story concerns power and the price that is paid for it, and is a surprising and insightful portrait of an extraordinary and complex woman.

programme.desc: The true story of how down-on-her-luck single mother Erin Brokovish put together one of the biggest class actions suits in US history and won the high profile case against a multi-million dollar company despite her lack of formal education in the law.(n)

programme.title: Julie & Julia
programme.desc: Based on true events, the film juxtaposes the journey of renowned chef Julia Child and how she achieved her fame, and the story of an ordinary woman, Julie Powell, who tries to reinvent her life by documenting her year-long challenge to cook all the available recipes in Julia Child’s cookbook.(n)

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: The Kadam family leaves India and head to France after their Bombay restaurant gets eaten up by a fire. They finally reside in a village and decide it’s where they’ll open their new restaurant, they discover that across the street is the acclaimed restaurant of the snobbish Madame Mallory.(n)

programme.title: The Age of Adaline
programme.desc: Adaline Bowman (Blake Lively) is born in the early 1920s. After an accident, she becomes ageless. She remains 29 years old for eight decades, and after years of isolation, she meets a man who rekindles her passion for life. She spends a weekend with his parents, and finds her secret threatened.(n)

programme.title: The Light Between Oceans
programme.desc: A lighthouse keeper and his wife living off the coast of Western Australia, find a baby in a lifeboat. After they adopt the child, they learn later that a boat accident occurred at the same time they found the child and a woman tells them that she lost her husband and her child that day.(n)

programme.desc: SpongeBob returns for more underwater adventures, driven along by his curiosity and his attempt to discover everything new in his world.

programme.title: The Wolfman
programme.desc: In this 2010 remake of the horror fiction classic Benicio Del Toro and Anthony Hopkins come together to revive an old legend. Upon learning of his brother’s sudden disappearance Lawrence Talbot (Benicio Del Toro) returns with his brother’s fiancé to the ancestral family home in Blackmoor. Upon arriving at Blackmoor he discovers grizzly family secrets that have long been hidden.

programme.title: F/x
programme.desc: A special effects expert is hired to stage a real-life killing for a witness protection plan, but he finds himself in danger.

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: Accountant Calvin Joyner and Bob Stone ,are old schoolmates who reconnect through Facebook. But Calvin suddenly finds himself lured into the world of espionage and collecting information with its various dangers.

programme.title: I, Frankenstein
programme.desc: Frankenstein's monster becomes involved in an ancient war between two immortal clans of demons and gargoyles.

programme.title: Paycheck
programme.desc: Michael is an engineer, who has his memory erased after completing each job. When the wealthy James Rithrick offers him a multiple-year contract, with the same conditions, he realizes that erasing his memory has erased crucial details of the work assignment.

programme.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
programme.desc: Optimus Prime finds his home planet, Cybertron, now a dead planet, and tries to find the person behind its death. He finds a way to bring the planet back to life, but in order to do so, he needs to find an artifact, which is on Earth.

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: After being imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, a street racer joins a cross-country race with a plan for revenge. When his ex-partner learns of his intentions, he places a bounty on his head as the race starts.

programme.title: Safe House
programme.desc: Ex-CIA agent Tobin Frost turns out to be an international criminal. He enters an American consulate and gets moved to a CIA safe house in Cape Town, South Africa. The "housekeeper" of this safe house is agent Matt Weston (Ryan Reynolds) who escapes with Frost when the house got attacked. They must stay out of the gunmen's sight until they get to another safe house.

programme.title: The Maze Runner
programme.desc: When Thomas wakes up in the lift, the only thing he can remember is his first name. When the lift's doors open, Thomas finds himself surrounded by kids who welcome him to the Glade, a large maze enclosed by stone walls, and just like Thomas, the Gladers don't know why or how they got to the Glade, and they all must escape the deadly-creatures-infested place.

programme.title: Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: Thomas and his fellow Gladers try to regain their lives again after escaping from the maze, but find that life outside the maze is a desolate waste land full of blood-thirsty zombies. At the same time they're trying to find clues to guide them to the organization behind the maze.

programme.title: This Means War
programme.desc: Tuck and Frank (Tom Hardy and Chris Pine) are two best friends and CIA agents. They fall in love with the same girl, Lauren (Reese Witherspoon). She's confused between both of them. Both men agree to let her choose. But they just can't stop using their skills to keep tabs on her.

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: Princess Diana, Princess of the Amazon, was trained at Paradise Island to become an invincible warrior. When an American pilot lands on her island and tells her about the outside world, she decides to leave her home in the hope of seeing new cultures and meeting other warriors from Greece. She becomes Wonder Woman and tries to stop ongoing wars while testing her superpowers.

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: A group known as the "The Organization." hires a professional hit-man who goes by the name of Agent 47, getting him involved in a political conspiracy involving the Interpol and the Russian army. While attempting to escape through Russia and Eastern Europe, he seems to be strangely affected by a mysterious Russian woman.

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: An elite assassin, genetically engineered to be the perfect killing machine, known only by the last two digits on the barcode tattooed on the back of his neck; 47, teams up with a young woman, targeting a mega-corporation planning to unlock the secret of Agent 47's past to create an army of killers.

programme.title: Robocop 3
programme.desc: A greedy corporation is determined to eradicate the city of Detroit and begin its developmental project, Delta City. They employ armed forces to frighten the citizens, and RoboCop joins the civilian resistance to side with the citizens and save them.

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: After being imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, a street racer joins a cross-country race with a plan for revenge. When his ex-partner learns of his intentions, he places a bounty on his head as the race starts.

programme.title: Safe House
programme.desc: Ex-CIA agent Tobin Frost turns out to be an international criminal. He enters an American consulate and gets moved to a CIA safe house in Cape Town, South Africa. The "housekeeper" of this safe house is agent Matt Weston (Ryan Reynolds) who escapes with Frost when the house got attacked. They must stay out of the gunmen's sight until they get to another safe house.

programme.title: The Maze Runner
programme.desc: When Thomas wakes up in the lift, the only thing he can remember is his first name. When the lift's doors open, Thomas finds himself surrounded by kids who welcome him to the Glade, a large maze enclosed by stone walls, and just like Thomas, the Gladers don't know why or how they got to the Glade, and they all must escape the deadly-creatures-infested place.

programme.title: Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: Thomas and his fellow Gladers try to regain their lives again after escaping from the maze, but find that life outside the maze is a desolate waste land full of blood-thirsty zombies. At the same time they're trying to find clues to guide them to the organization behind the maze.

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: An ex-army officer returns to his home town wanting to work in the local mill, but he finds the town filled with drugs and corruption after the mill was closed and turned into a Casino.

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: In 79 A.D., a slave turned gladiator races against time to save his beloved from marrying a corrupt Roman Senator, as Mount Vesuvius erupts in the Roman city of Pompeii.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs. Smith
programme.desc: A married couple going through marriage counseling discover that they are both assassins working for competing agencies when they are charged with killing each other.

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: A runaway train carrying toxic chemicals must be stopped before it derails and kills everyone in town. Its up to a train conductor and engineer (Denzel Washington and Chris Pine) to stop the train in time.

programme.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
programme.desc: Optimus Prime finds his home planet, Cybertron, now a dead planet, and tries to find the person behind its death. He finds a way to bring the planet back to life, but in order to do so, he needs to find an artifact, which is on Earth.

programme.title: xXx: The Return of Xander Cage
programme.desc: Xander Cage returns after self-imposed exile leaving an impression that he was long dead. He secretly works with his handler, Augustus Gibbons, and his team to recover a sinister and seemingly unstoppable weapon known as Pandora's box.

programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
programme.desc: In the fourth Jason Bourne feature film, a unique agent, Aaron Cross, is enrolled in an enhanced US Defense Department black ops program "Operation Outcome". Agents are given chemical pills to genetically amplify their abilities. After the older programs are publicly exposed, CIA directors are investigated followed by a decision to shut down Outcome and eliminate all its agents and scientists.

programme.title: 88 Minutes
programme.desc: Dr. Jack Gramm is a forensic psychologist whose testimony helps convict serial killer Jon Forster. As Forster's execution date looms closer, Gramm receives a call informing him that he only has 88 minutes to live.

programme.title: Road House
programme.desc: In a small town in Missouri, Dalton is hired to clean up the sordid bar called The Double Deuce from the troublemakers who terrorize the customers.

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: An ex-army officer returns to his home town wanting to work in the local mill, but he finds the town filled with drugs and corruption after the mill was closed and turned into a Casino.

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: In 79 A.D., a slave turned gladiator races against time to save his beloved from marrying a corrupt Roman Senator, as Mount Vesuvius erupts in the Roman city of Pompeii.(n)

programme.title: Mr & Mrs. Smith
programme.desc: A married couple going through marriage counseling discover that they are both assassins working for competing agencies when they are charged with killing each other.(n)

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: A runaway train carrying toxic chemicals must be stopped before it derails and kills everyone in town. Its up to a train conductor and engineer (Denzel Washington and Chris Pine) to stop the train in time.(n)

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: The L.A.P.D.'s Special Weapons and Tactics team (S.W.A.T.) is charged with securing and escorting criminal Alex Montell, who is a foreign mafia leader wanted by the Interpol. Alex is offering a $ 100 million reward for anyone who can break him out of police custody.(n)

programme.title: The Tourist
programme.desc: An unwitting American tourist named Frank finds himself in the midst of an intense pursuit that involves various European police forces and a gang of Belarusians among other parties. A seemingly minor error causes Frank to be mistaken for a man wanted by law authorities and mafia men alike.(n)

programme.title: Empire State
programme.desc: Based on true events, Chris Potatmitis settles for a security guard job at the Empire State Armored Truck Company after he disqualifies at the Police Academy. He mentions their faulty processes to his best friend, Eddie, and unexpectedly becomes part of an eleven million dollar heist. The police, and local crime bosses who are angered by their unapproved work in their turf, are now after them.(n)

programme.title: Gone in 60 Seconds
programme.desc: A story of how siblings go too far to save one another as a retired master car thief is forced to get back to the industry and reassemble his gang for one dangerous mission, facing an old rivalry with a group of thieves as well as the local police, just to save his brother.(n)

programme.title: Face/Off
programme.desc: To foil a terrorist plot by ruthless criminal Castor Troy, FBI Special Agent Sean Archer agrees to undergo a surgical face implant to impersonate Troy physically, only to find that Troy is fighting him back using the same technique.(n)

programme.title: Triple 9
programme.desc: A gang plans a big heist with a group of corrupt cops, by calling in a 999 dispatch, which is code for “officer down” to lure out a rookie officer, in order for them to pull-off their heist – their plan take unforeseen turns when an unsuspected member has a change of mind.(n)

programme.title: The Kingdom
programme.desc: When an American facility in the Middle East is bombarded, a group of U.S. government agents is asked to investigate the incident and find the culprits in a snowballing battle.(n)

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: When he returns from the war to find that the corrupt Sheriff of Nottingham has seized his land, Robin of Loxley comes to realize the extent of the corruption underlying England's Crusades, leaving him to join forces with his best friend and an Arabian warrior to challenge the English crown.(n)

programme.title: Joshua Tree
programme.desc: As Wellman Santee manages to break out of prison, trouble begins when he, unbeknownst to him, kidnaps a female police officer on his way to take revenge on the corrupt cop who put him under lock and key.(n)

programme.title: Abduction
programme.desc: Upon discovering his baby photo on a website for missing persons, Nathan discovers that the father and mother he has been living with throughout his youth are not his real parents. He sets out to uncover the truth about his life.(n)

programme.title: Slumdog Millionaire
programme.desc: (Jamal Malik) a poor youngster who grew up in Mumbai, becomes the contestant on the Indian version of (Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?). He is arrested for suspected cheating on the program. While he's interrogated ,the events show his difficult history that explains why he answers the questions.

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: Rocky is back again, but this time as a retired boxer enjoying a stable life among his fans who remember his glory days. Rocky then decides to have his final fight with heavyweight champ (Mason) for the title of greatest boxer in history.

programme.title: The Choice
programme.desc: Irfan is an idealistic professor who gets out of a job and he is in a dilemma as the doors close one by one in his face and he has to find a way to look after his sick son, even if this means getting into an inescapable dark adventure.

programme.desc: After losing his job, a father goes to work with a Forest Fire fighting group , and the mother has a relationship with a rich man. Their son becomes the witness of the failure of marriage and of his mother's infidelity to his father.

programme.desc: Mavis surprises Dracula with a luxurious voyage on a cruise to give him the chance to enjoy his time instead of always provide the fun for everyone else. On the cruise he falls for the mysterious ship captain, Ericka.

programme.title: Into the Blue 2: The Reef
programme.desc: When they are hired by an investor to look for Columbus' hidden treasure under the sea, married couple Sebastian and Dani find themselves in the midst of a large conspiracy when they discover that the treasure is actually a nuclear warhead.

programme.title: All Yours
programme.desc: When she is in need of someone to take care of her children, the widowed attorney Casey finds her man in Matt, a family friend that she hires as a nanny. With Matt added to the mix, Casey finds her family life completely changed and sparks start to fly between her and Matt.

programme.title: Little Man Tate
programme.desc: Fred is a genius in math and reading, but he can't adjust with other children in school, he's slowly isolated from them and finds it difficult to socialize next to those of his age, he gets help from his teacher and his single mom.

programme.title: Aloha
programme.desc: In Hawaii, a military contractor relives his glory days at the site of his greatest achievement. But his return to the island stirs up past memories with his former girlfriend, which makes his new feeling for his Air Force liaison more complicated.

programme.title: A Little Bit of Heaven
programme.desc: When the irreverent Marley learns that she is terminally ill, the last thing she expects is to fall in love after God appears to her to grant her three wishes before her death.

programme.title: Flightplan
programme.desc: On her way back to New York after retrieving her husband's body, the grieving Kyle wakes up from a nap to find her 6-year-old daughter Julie missing. As she searches the plane for her daughter, everyone insists that Julie was never on the plane in the first place.

programme.title: Stalked by My Mother
programme.desc: When her boyfriend is killed, Maddy is accused of being the culprit, but she points the finger at her own mother instead. Little do they both know that the boyfriend was never the target, and that real culprit is closer than they think.

programme.title: The Horse Whisperer
programme.desc: A young horse rider gets in an accident that leaves her and her horse badly injured. Despite recommendations to put the horse to sleep, her mother enlists the help of a known horse trainer to help both the horse and the girl.

programme.title: Super 8
programme.desc: In the summer of 1979, a group of friends in a small Ohio town witness a catastrophic train crash while making a super 8 film, they soon suspect that it was not an accident. Shortly after, unusual disappearances and inexplicable events begin to take place in town, and the local deputy tries to uncover the truth. Something more terrifying than any of them could have imagined.

programme.title: House at the End of the Street
programme.desc: After her parents separate, Elissa moves with her mother to their dream house in the country. But the dream is disturbed when they learn that the house at the end of their street was the scene of a violent crime where a girl killed her parents.

programme.title: Dragonfly
programme.desc: D. Joe Darrow (Kevin Costner) lives alone after the death of his wife Emily (Susanna Thompson), Joe lives in a world of sorrow due to the loss of his pregnant wife who died during a Red Cross mission in Venezuela. Joe tries to return to work in the hospital. Although he does not believe in the existence of afterlife, Darrow begins to believe that his dead wife is trying to communicate with him.

programme.title: She's Funny That Way
programme.desc: A married Broadway director falls for a prostitute-turned-actress and decides to professionally adopt her, while she in turn is having another affair simultaneously with the writer of the play they're working on.

programme.desc: (Jamal Malik) a poor youngster who grew up in Mumbai, becomes the contestant on the Indian version of (Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?). programme.title: The Current War
programme.desc: The pioneers of the electrical industry Thomas Edison and George Westinghouse compete to create a sustainable system and sell it to the American people.

programme.title: Criminal Activities
programme.desc: When four friends take advantage of an insider tip to make an investment, their hope of getting rich end up being dashed, leaving them in a perilous position since the money they used came from a notorious mobster. Soon, the mobster robs them into carrying out a kidnapping to cover their debt.

programme.title: Queen of the Desert
programme.desc: A biopic about the life of British explorer and adventurer, Gertrude Bell, chronicling her journey of love and loss in the Middle East during the early 20th century.

programme.title: Shallow Hal
programme.desc: Hal only dates beautiful girls, following the advice of his dying father. His life changes when he meets a self-help guru, who hypnotizes him into only seeing the inner beauty of women. He then meets the overweight girl Rosemary,whom he sees as the most beautiful girl and he falls in love with her.(n)

programme.title: Mrs. Doubtfire
programme.desc: Following their divorce, Daniel Hillard's wife takes custody of the children, leaving Daniel to look for a way to see his children. Daniel eventually disguises himself as a housekeeper named Mrs. Doubtfire and convinces his ex-wife to hire him as a nanny.(n)

programme.title: The Love Punch
programme.desc: A divorced couple, Richard and Kate, puts their differences aside and plots to recover their stolen retirement money from the company owner.(n)

programme.title: The Last Emperor
programme.desc: The tale of China’s last emperor, Puyi, from his coronation at the age of two, to his subsequent fall from glory.(n)

programme.title: The Way Back
programme.desc: Set in the beginning of the 1940's, three men escape from the Siberian militant camps in Russia and cross over all the way to India, a distance estimated to be around 4000 miles. During their journey, they are joined by a teenage girl and four other men, on a near-impossible mission.(n)

programme.title: Rudderless
programme.desc: After his son tragically dies, a grieving father is unable to deal with his son's loss. But when he comes across his son's demo tapes and lyrics, he starts forming a band that gives his life a purpose.(n)

programme.title: How to Talk to Girls at Parties
programme.desc: When two friends crash the wrong party, they come across a group of girls displaying weird behavior. Among them is Zan, who reveals that she is an alien who has left her species behind.(n)

programme.title: The Endless
programme.desc: Two brothers revisit the UFO death cult that they escaped a decade ago after they receive a cryptic video message in hopes of finding closure.(n)

programme.title: Vicky Cristina Barcelona
programme.desc: Two girlfriends, Cristina and Vicky, one more rooted in sensuality and the other in logic and routine, travel to Barcelona and meet the charming painter Juan Antonio who becomes involved with both of them. Also in the mix is his passionate and unstable ex-wife, Maria.(n)

programme.title: American Wrestler: The Wizard
programme.desc: Inspired by true events, an Iranian boy flees the violence in his home country and seeks refuge in the US, only to feel alienated by an unwelcome community. In a bid to fit in, he joins his school's floundering wrestling team, and promptly becomes its star player.(n)
